mapper.select: select count(*) from member where memberid = #{memberid}
mapper.insert: insert into member (memberid, mname, mpassword, mtype, mphone, memail, maddr, mbirthdate, mgender, marketingagree) values(#{memberid}, #{mname}, #{mpassword}, #{mtype}, #{mphone} , #{memail}, #{maddr}, #{mbirthdate}, #{mgender}, #{marketingagree})
